laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for both Hepatitis B and C antigens.
Initially given at 30 mg/d (0.5 mg/kg per day), increased to 40 mg/d after 2 weeks.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Pruritus improved significantly and hypertrophic lichen planus flattened within 2 weeks; no change in lesions of lichen amyloidosis at 6-week follow-up or after increasing dose.
